content.rendered:
• Unilaterally self-supporting step ladder with knee-rail
  • Suitable for household use
  • Comfortable top platform
  • Durable webbing as opening restraint and also the top platform locks into place
  • Galvanized steel hinges
  • Wide nonslip steps
  • Nonskid rubber fee
  • Metal active gas welding,
  • Plastic wedges,
  • Table step,
  • Cyanide free galvanized coating,
  • Folding, easy to carry,
  • Ergonomic,
  • Step Width: 7.5 cm
  • Product Weight kg: 4.96

excerpt.rendered:
KSh 13,999.00 Excl Tax

TYPE: STEP LADDER

9 Steps household aluminium ladder,

TOTAL STEPS: 9 STEPS

FUNCTION: FOLDABLE / FOLDING LADDER

MATERIAL: ALUMINIUM

MAXIMUM LOAD: 150 KGS

LADDER INSULATION: NON-INSULATED
